title: Signals Master
description: A web application crafted for cadets, military personnel, and enthusiasts to learn and practice signal communication.

title: DevLog
description: My own custom development log journal. Meant to track and document my coding progress and projects, through blog posts.

title: Cadet Inventory Management System
description: A professional, enterprise-style web application designed to manage inventory, loan requests, and logistics for a cadet organization. Provides a structured, multi-role access model to ensure efficient operations.

title: Ember Watch
description: A comprehensive wildfire monitoring and alert system designed to collect and centralize real-time environmental data from remote fire-watch towers.
